markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Drake Courser](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1479)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Dragon](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2)): DC 32

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 30

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 27
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 12">[Drake Courser](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1479)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="CN" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Cold" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=27" />
<trait label="Dragon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=50" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #167: Ready? Fight!](/Sources.aspx?ID=86) pg. 13</row>

**Perception** +22; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), [scent](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=33) (imprecise) 30 feet, snow vision

**Languages**
[Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2), [Tien](/Languages.aspx?ID=43)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +27, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +23, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +19

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +5

**Dex** +7

**Con** +5

**Int** -1

**Wis** +4

**Cha** +1
</row>

**Snow Vision** Snow doesn't impair a drake courser's vision. It ignores [concealment](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4) from snowfall.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 32 

**Fort** +23 

**Ref** +25 

**Will** +18 

</row>

**HP** 230

**Immunities**
[cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=27), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38)

**Weaknesses**
[fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72) 15

**Attack of Opportunity** <actions string="Reaction" /> Tail only. On a critical hit, the target is knocked [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=31); if the target was using a [move](/Traits.aspx?ID=114) action, its movement ends.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 35 feet, fly 65 feet, swim 35 feet, ice climb 35 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fangs +25,
**Damage** 3d12+11 piercing plus 1d6 cold

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
tail +25 ([reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 3d10+11 bludgeoning plus [Knockdown](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=20)

**Battle Dance** <actions string="Two Actions" />  The drake courser makes two fangs Strikes and one tail Strike in any order. It can replace any of these Strikes with [Demoralize](/Actions.aspx?ID=53) or Step.

**Buffeting Surge** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Move](/Traits.aspx?ID=114)) **Frequency** three times per day; **Effect** The drake courser moves up to twice its Speed. It can attempt to [Trip](/Actions.aspx?ID=40) with its tail once at any point during its movement.

**Freezing Mist Breath** <actions string="Two Actions" />  The drake spits a ball of liquid up to 60 feet that explodes into a 20-foot burst of freezing mist. Those in the burst take 13d6 cold damage (DC 31 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save). The mist cakes all surfaces in the area with a sheet of slippery ice that turns the area into difficult terrain for 2d4 rounds. It can't use Freezing Mist Breath again for 1d6 rounds.

**Ice Climb**   A drake courser can climb on ice as though it had the listed climb Speed. It ignores difficult terrain and greater difficult terrain from ice and snow and doesn't risk falling when crossing ice.

</column>
name: Drake Courser
